query.statement:
SELECT Q.PAPRYYYYMM, Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO , (SELECT N.DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.LANG = 'ko' AND N.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) AS TEMNM , (SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND MM028.LANG = 'ko' AND MM028.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS , C.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM , (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND TEMNO = Q.TEMNO) AS NAMET2 , CASE WHEN Q.CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.CNT END AS CNT , CASE WHEN Q.POINT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.POINT END AS POINT , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM( CASE WHEN Q.POINT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.POINT END ) OVER (PARTITION BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ORDER BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ) desc) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT MANDT , PAPRYYYYMM , LIFNR --업체번호 , TEMNO --팀장번호 , SUM(CNT) AS CNT --민원건수 , SUM(POINT) POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT , PAPRYYYYMM --검사일자 , LIFNR --업체번호 , TEMNO --팀장번호 , SUM(CNT) AS CNT --민원건수 , DEC((SUM(CNT) * -(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE))), 10, 1) AS POINT FROM ( SELECT A.RDATE ,A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,A.SEQNO ,SUBSTR(A.RDATE,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM ,ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PSPID) AS CNT ,A.LIFNR ,A.TEMNO --팀장 M02.NAMET2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1307 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M01 ON M01.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M01.POSID = A.PSPID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE <> 'D' AND A.LIFNR <> ' ' AND (substr(A.RDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M01.PRART = #CHK_GBN2#
UNION ALL SELECT A.RDATE ,A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,A.SEQNO ,substr(A.RDATE,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM ,ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PSPID, A.SUPR_DT) AS CNT ,A.LIFNR ,A.TEMNO --팀장 M02.NAMET2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1307B AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M01 ON M01.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M01.POSID = A.PSPID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE <> 'D' AND A.LIFNR <> ' ' AND (substr(A.RDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M01.PRART = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO
UNION ALL SELECT MANDT ,PAPRYYYYMM ,LIFNR --업체번호 ,TEMNO ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT --민원건수 ,SUM(POINT) AS POINT FROM (
( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS POINT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1058619749' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
-- AND LIFNR = '1321110475' ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS Q INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON Q.MANDT = C.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON Q.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND Q.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON Q.MANDT = W.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = W.LIFNR WHERE W.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' ) AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
